name: Butternut Squash Bisque
recipeIngredient: 3 Tbsp plain low fat Greek yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in soup pot over medium heat. Add onion and salt; cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is softened (5-7 minutes).
Add garlic, nutmeg and cayenne; stir and cook 1 minute. Add squash and broth; bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, until squash is soft, about 30 minutes; stir in yogurt and sugar.
Remove from heat and puree soup in pot. Serve garnished with fresh sage and black pepper.
